name: Red Wizard Island
description:
Red Wizard Island is a casual platformer with a little bit of RPG elements and a lot of shoot em up influences. You control a little wizard and jump around while shooting fireballs at various enemies.

Things you will experience in this game:

  • Help a farmer find his sheep
  • Travel on a viking ship
  • Fight a viking chicken
  • Free a captive prince
  • Fly on a bird while avoiding cows being catapulted at you

Other things:

  • More than 10 different enemies
  • 4 different magic spells
  • 4 different environments: castle, forest, green fields, and water
  • 6 levels in current (early access) version
